doctors.name: Dr. Ayesha Khan
doctors.title: Professor
doctors.bio: 25+ years leading kidney transplant programs with a focus on living donor transplants and long-term outcomes.

doctors.name: Dr. Omar Raza
doctors.title: Consultant
doctors.bio: Minimally invasive urologic surgeries, laser stone management, and endourology.

doctors.name: Dr. Maria Zuberi
doctors.title: Associate Professor
doctors.bio: Expert in immunosuppression protocols and rejection surveillance, optimizing patient safety.

doctors.name: Dr. Naveed Haider
doctors.title: Consultant Surgeon
doctors.bio: Specializes in complex transplant cases and vascular access surgeries.

doctors.name: Dr. Sara Malik
doctors.title: Senior Registrar
doctors.bio: Dialysis care, pre-transplant optimization, and patient counseling for international clients.

doctors.name: Dr. Imran Siddiq
doctors.title: Consultant Anesthetist
doctors.bio: Perioperative optimization and enhanced recovery protocols for high-risk patients.

doctors.name: Dr. Leena Farooq
doctors.title: Clinical Psychologist
doctors.bio: Counseling for transplant recipients and donors, addressing psychosocial needs.

doctors.name: Dr. Kamran Yousaf
doctors.title: Consultant
doctors.bio: Imaging-guided procedures, biopsies, and vascular access for transplant patients.

doctors.name: Dr. Nadia Rahman
doctors.title: Dietitian
doctors.bio: Tailored nutrition plans for pre- and post-transplant care and dialysis patients.

doctors.name: Dr. Faisal Qureshi
doctors.title: Coordinator
doctors.bio: Coordinates visas, travel logistics, and continuity of care for overseas families.
